value.title: Coronavirus in Oregon: Portland-area districts cancel field trips, assemblies, ban public from sporting events
value.excerpt: Portland Public Schools has cancelled assemblies, field trips and will bar the public from attending sporting events following guidance issued by Oregon Gov. Kate Brown to stem the spread of coronavirus Wednesday. School board meetings will also be closed to the public but will be live-streamed. The ban starts Thursday and will last for 30 days.
